_header: These wounds smart bear in thy heart
Subjects: illustrations, verse accompanying; Christ, wounds of
_description: Verses on a scroll accompanying a drawing of Christ’s wounded heart — six lines

BLAdd37049.Transcription:
Þies woundes smertbere in þi hert& luf god
                    aweYf yow do þisþu sal hafe blyswith outen
                    delay
